com.valentine.esp

Class ValentineESP.VRScanCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.valentine.esp.ValentineESP.VRScanCallback
  • Enclosing class:
    ValentineESP

    public abstract static class ValentineESP.VRScanCallback
extends java.lang.Object
    Callback used to return found BluetoothDevices, and notify callback owner that the scanning process has completed.

    • Method Detail

      • onDeviceFound

        public abstract void onDeviceFound(BluetoothDeviceBundle bluetoothDeviceBundle,
                 ConnectionType connectionType)
        Callback to the return a BluetoothDeviceBundle to the callback owner. Only V1Connection BluetoothDevices are returned.
        Parameters:
        bluetoothDeviceBundle - A bundle consisting of a discovered BluetoothDevice and RSSI value.
        connectionType - The connectionType of the scanning process that triggered this callback.

      • onScanComplete

        public abstract void onScanComplete(ConnectionType connectionType)
        Callback to notify the object owner that the scanning process has completed.
        Parameters:
        connectionType -
